thread.title: Only on AP: Clinton server ran software that risked hacking
thread.title_full: Only on AP: Clinton server ran software that risked hacking

title: Only on AP: Clinton server ran software that risked hacking
text: Only on AP: Clinton server ran software that risked hacking By Associated Press | October 13, 2015 @ 12:28 am \n FILE - In this Oct. 18, 2011, file photo, then-Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton checks her Blackberry from a desk inside a C-17 military plane upon her departure from Malta, in the Mediterranean Sea, bound for Tripoli, Libya. The private email server running in Clintonâs home basement when she was secretary of state was connected to the Internet in ways that made it more vulnerable to hackers, according to data and documents reviewed by The Associated Press. (Kevin Lamarque/Pool Photo via AP, File)\n
